author: PlayStation
description:
An unexpected yet undeniable mix of dominance and power from the wrestling and basketball worlds collide in the Dunk & Destruction Pack. Take the fight from the court to the ring with this eclectic collection of powerhouse athletes that bring the pain no matter where they compete.
The Dunk & Destruction Pack includes the following playable Superstars and their MyFACTION cards:
Shaquille O’Neal
Tyrese Haliburton
Abyss
Great Khali
Jalen Brunson

The Dunk & Destruction Pack is included as part of the Season Pass, Ringside Pass, and as part of WWE 2K25 Deadman and The Bloodline Editions.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #wwe2k25
title: WWE 2K25 - Dunk & Destruction Pack DLC 2 Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
The time has come to return to the floating kingdom of Duviri!

Dominus Thrax has been usurped by Major Neci Rusalka and the Murmur as the Indifference encroaches on these storybook isles.

You must fight back against these encroaching enemies and stop their invasion before it's too late. Experience an exciting new twist on Duviri gameplay, master the arachnid huntress Warframe: Oraxia, and earn a brand new Incarnon Scythe (among other rewards) during Operation: Eight Claw!

►► WHAT IS WARFRAME? 

Join 84M+ registered players in Warframe, a cooperative, free-to-play third-person looter shooter set in a constantly evolving sci-fi universe. 

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #warframe 

Rated Mature
title: Warframe - Isleweaver Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Gloomy Eyes is a single-player “self-coop” cozy horror adventure set in a Tim Burton-esque world. Coming to PS5 in 2025.

Players will alternate between controlling two unique characters as they embark on a journey to bring sunlight back to a world plunged into nasty, bitter darkness. The game is set in a lovingly haunting visual aesthetic, reminiscent of Corpse Bride and The Nightmare Before Christmas.

There’s no gore or jump scares, just an enchanting, haunting atmosphere and a whimsical tale of forbidden companionship that will tug at your undead heartstrings.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Gloomy Eyes - Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
From customization, the largest roster in the series, and helpful caddies to play with, there's so many characters to meet! Plus, challenge tournaments, tour the world, and even putt in a wacky party mode! EVERYBODY'S GOLF HOT SHOTS flies across the fairway on September 5.

#ps5 #ps5games #everybodysgolf
title: Everybody's Golf Hot Shots - Systems Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Endurance Motorsport Series provides unique gameplay in which the way you adapt your decisions and race strategy to events (incidents, weather, etc) is just as important as your driving skills. You will have to find the best balance between speed and consistency in your search for victory.

In addition to the genuine challenge posed by the duration of the races, one of the prominent features of endurance racing is that it is multi-class. You progress through a selection of the best Hypercars, LMP2 and GT from the major car manufacturers.

🎮 Wishlist Endurance Motorsport Series Now!

Plus, enjoy a FREE update with stylish luxury cosmetics to make your vehicle stand out on the streets.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Endurance Motorsport Series - BMW Motorsports Teaser Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009209/

Drive like your life depends on it! Use your skills to destroy enemy vehicles and race against the clock to deliver the ARC. The arcade racer is back and more explosive than ever in Fatal Run 2089, launching Fall 2025.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Fatal Run 2089 - Gameplay Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-US/games/vigor/

Embrace the chaos in Vigor Turmoil! Pick through the decaying remnants of the Outlands, gathering what’s left before the radiation clouds consume everything in their wake. The future is uncertain, but by repurposing the old to forge the new, you can reclaim it.

This Season’s Battle Pass is packed with Cosmetics torn from the wreckage of the past, reassembled and ready for the mayhem that lies ahead. Turn scavenged loot into essential items with the Crafting Rework, featuring improvements to the UI and Ammo Press, plus the hotly-requested Batch Crafting feature!

Unleash destruction with the all-new Impact Grenade, an explosive consumable that detonates on impact. We're also ramping up the action with special events for Shootouts and a new Unexploded Missile Loot Event for Encounters.

An unstoppable threat is now made visible as well, with Radiation Visual Effects creeping across the map and bleeding into the sky.

From the ruins of Doo
title: Vigor - Turmoil Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.gran-turismo.com/us/

Video description:
Drive the iconic WRC champion and the mini-Italian stallion, the ’92 Lancia Delta HF Integrale Rally Car with Update 1.60 for GT7. The very French slab-sided '87 Citroën BX 19 TRS and '21 Peugeot SUV 2008 round out the Euro-leaning car additions. Three new events, an Extra Menu, new Scotland Scapes location, and expanded Sophy AI racing agent to the Alsace – Village circuit round out the very fresh and very free content, courtesy of the Polyphony team. 

 

Update 1.60* for Gran Turismo 7 is available as of today Wednesday, June 25 at 11:00pm PDT / June 26 at 3:00pm JST / 8:00am CEST 

#ps5 #ps5games #psvr2 #psvr2games #granturismo7
title: Gran Turismo 7 - June 1.60 Update | PS5 & PS VR2 Games
